EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Website_Pivotal for Startups_2015.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal for Startups: Application Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for applying to the Pivotal for Startups program. We have received your application.
One of our teammates will review your application. If your startup qualifies, you will receive an email with further instructions. If you did not qualify, we ask you to review the program requirements or contact us <mailto:tmccollough@pivotal.io> with additional questions.
In the meantime, please visit our blog <http://blog.pivotal.io> or our website <http://pivotal.io> to learn more about Pivotal.
